title: MemArg

From the docs:

The , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=offset, value=kwasm.ast.instruction.MemArg.offset) CommentComponent(kind=text, text= and alignment immediates to memory instructions are optional. The , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=offset, value=kwasm.ast.instruction.MemArg.offset) CommentComponent(kind=text, text= defaults to 0 and the alignment to the storage size of the respective memory access, which is its natural alignment.
